DOC.detailed_description: This phase I open-label study evaluate safety immunogenicity plasmid mammaglobin-A DNA vaccine . The plasmid mammaglobin-A DNA vaccine formulate naked plasmid DNA vaccine ( WUSM-MGBA-01 ) . The hypothesis study mammaglobin-A DNA vaccine safe human administration capable generate measurable CD8 T cell responses mammaglobin-A . The primary objective study demonstrate safety mammaglobin-A DNA vaccine . The secondary objective evaluate immunogenicity mammaglobin-A DNA vaccine measure ELISPOT analysis , surrogate CD8 T cell function .
